snippet: Liverpool have been hit with a second UEFA fine in less than a week for their fans letting off fireworks during their Europa League quarter-final against Borussia Dortmund in April....

headline.main: Liverpool Handed Second UEFA Fine in Less Than a Week
headline.print_headline: Liverpool Handed Second UEFA Fine in Less Than a Week

lead_paragraph: Liverpool have been hit with a second UEFA fine in less than a week for their fans letting off fireworks during their Europa League quarter-final against Borussia Dortmund in April.

snippet: Burnley went to the top of the England Championship league after Joey Barton’s deflected free kick secured a 1-0 win at Preston North End....
abstract: Burnley beats Preston North End, 1-0, to reach top of England Championsip League; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Burnley went to the top of the England Championship league after Joey Barton’s deflected free kick secured a 1-0 win at Preston North End.

snippet: Leicester's improbable march towards a first Premier League title continued at Crystal Palace on Saturday as Riyad Mahrez scored a winner that put them eight points clear at the top....

headline.main: Leicester's March to Improbable Glory Continues at Palace
headline.print_headline: Leicester's March to Improbable Glory Continues at Palace

lead_paragraph: Leicester's improbable march towards a first Premier League title continued at Crystal Palace on Saturday as Riyad Mahrez scored a winner that put them eight points clear at the top.

snippet: Individual errors proved costly for Liverpool and Manchester United on a day of late goals and incredible comebacks in English soccer on Sunday....

lead_paragraph: Individual errors proved costly for Liverpool and Manchester United on a day of late goals and incredible comebacks in English soccer on Sunday.

snippet: Manager Juergen Klopp has urged his players to seize an opportunity to become part of Liverpool folklore when they face back-to-back champions Sevilla in the Europa League final in Basel on Wednesday....

headline.main: Klopp Urges Players to Cement Names in Liverpool History
headline.print_headline: Klopp Urges Players to Cement Names in Liverpool History

lead_paragraph: Manager Juergen Klopp has urged his players to seize an opportunity to become part of Liverpool folklore when they face back-to-back champions Sevilla in the Europa League final in Basel on Wednesday.

snippet: Manuel Pellegrini's hopes of seeing out his Manchester City reign this season in a blaze of glory were boosted on Tuesday as the masterful Sergio Aguero delivered again in an unconvincing  1-0 win at struggling Sunderland....

headline.main: Aguero Gives Outgoing Pellegrini Reason to Smile
headline.print_headline: Aguero Gives Outgoing Pellegrini Reason to Smile

lead_paragraph: Manuel Pellegrini's hopes of seeing out his Manchester City reign this season in a blaze of glory were boosted on Tuesday as the masterful Sergio Aguero delivered again in an unconvincing  1-0 win at struggling Sunderland.

snippet: Arsenal defender Per Mertesacker has asked the club's academy players to make the most of goalkeeper Petr Cech's vast experience and get better....

headline.main: Mertesacker Tells Arsenal Youngsters to Tap Into Cech's Experience
headline.print_headline: Mertesacker Tells Arsenal Youngsters to Tap Into Cech's Experience

lead_paragraph: Arsenal defender Per Mertesacker has asked the club's academy players to make the most of goalkeeper Petr Cech's vast experience and get better.

snippet: Leicester City's billionaire owner Vichai Srivaddhanaprabha says he is optimistic of hanging on to the club's key players next season amid speculation linking them to bigger rivals in England or Europe....

headline.main: Leicester Owner Confident of Keeping Star Players
headline.print_headline: Leicester Owner Confident of Keeping Star Players

lead_paragraph: Leicester City's billionaire owner Vichai Srivaddhanaprabha says he is optimistic of hanging on to the club's key players next season amid speculation linking them to bigger rivals in England or Europe.

snippet: Swiss international defender Timm Klose has joined Norwich City from Germany's Vfl Wolfsburg on a three-and-a-half year deal as the Premier League side's fourth signing of the January transfer window....

headline.main: Norwich Sign Swiss Defender Klose From Wolfsburg
headline.print_headline: Norwich Sign Swiss Defender Klose From Wolfsburg

lead_paragraph: Swiss international defender Timm Klose has joined Norwich City from Germany's Vfl Wolfsburg on a three-and-a-half year deal as the Premier League side's fourth signing of the January transfer window.

snippet: West Ham United have signed Italian striker Simone Zaza from Juventus on a season-long loan for an initial fee of five million pounds, the Premier League club said on Sunday....

headline.main: West Ham Sign Zaza on Loan From Juventus
headline.print_headline: West Ham Sign Zaza on Loan From Juventus

lead_paragraph: West Ham United have signed Italian striker Simone Zaza from Juventus on a season-long loan for an initial fee of five million pounds, the Premier League club said on Sunday.
